description.original: Make typesetting LaTeX math as fast as handwriting through snippets, text expansion, and editor enhancements
description.translation: Make typesetting LaTeX math as fast as handwriting through snippets, text expansion, and editor enhancements

dict.Notice(`Failed to load snippet variables: Notice(`Failed to load snippet variables from settings: ${e}`)
dict.Notice(`Failed to load snippets from set: Notice(`Failed to load snippets from settings: ${e}`)
dict..log(`Failed to load snippet variables f: .log(`Failed to load snippet variables from settings: ${e}`)
dict..error(['Popper: \"arrow\" element must: .error(['Popper: "arrow" element must be an HTMLElement (not an SVGElement)
dict..error(['Popper: \"arrow\" modifier\\'s: .error(['Popper: "arrow" modifier\'s `element` must be a child of the popper', "element."].join(" ")

Ensure the `placement` option matches the variation", "of the allowed placements.", 'For example, "auto" cannot be used to allow "bottom-start".', 'Use "auto-start" instead.'].join(" ")
dict..error('PopperJS: an invalid property ha: .error('PopperJS: an invalid property has been provided to the "' + modifier.name + '" modifier, valid properties are ' + VALID_PROPERTIES.map(function(s)

dict.description: \"Add space after trig func: description: "Add space after trig funcs. Skips letter h to allow sinh, cosh, etc."
dict.description: \"Add space after hyperboli: description: "Add space after hyperbolic trig funcs"
dict..setText(\"Make equations more readable: .setText("Make equations more readable by hiding LaTeX syntax and instead displaying it in a pretty format.")
dict..setText(\"LaTeX beneath the cursor will: .setText("LaTeX beneath the cursor will be revealed.")
dict..setText(\"Disabled by default to not co: .setText("Disabled by default to not confuse new users. However, I recommend turning this on once you are comfortable with the plugin!")
dict..setText(\"How long to delay the reveal: .setText("How long to delay the reveal of LaTeX for, in milliseconds, when the cursor moves over LaTeX. Defaults to 0 (LaTeX under the cursor is revealed immediately).")
dict..setText(\"Can be set to a positive numb: .setText("Can be set to a positive number, e.g. 300, to delay the reveal of LaTeX, making it much easier to navigate equations using arrow keys.")
dict..setText(\"When inside an equation, show: .setText("When inside an equation, show a popup preview window of the rendered math.")
dict..setText(\"The popup preview will be sho: .setText("The popup preview will be shown for all inline math equations, as well as for block math equations in Source mode.")
dict..setName(\"Load snippet variables from f: .setName("Load snippet variables from file or folder")
dict..setName(\"Remove trailing whitespaces i: .setName("Remove trailing whitespaces in snippets in inline math")
dict..setName(\"Remove closing $ when backspa: .setName("Remove closing $ when backspacing inside blank inline math")
dict..setName(\"Don't trigger snippets when I: .setName("Don't trigger snippets when IME is active")
dict..setName(\"Code languages to interpret a: .setName("Code languages to interpret as math mode")
dict..setDesc('Enter snippets here. Remember: .setDesc('Enter snippets here.  Remember to add a comma after each snippet, and escape all backslashes with an extra \\. Lines starting with "//" will be treated as comments and ignored.')
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to load snippets from: .setDesc("Whether to load snippets from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).")
dict..setDesc(\"What key to press to expand n: .setDesc("What key to press to expand non-auto snippets.")
dict..setDesc(\"When the cursor is adjacent t: .setDesc("When the cursor is adjacent to a bracket, highlight the matching bracket.")
dict..setDesc(\"Where to display the popup pr: .setDesc("Where to display the popup preview relative to the equation source.")
dict..setDesc(\"The fraction symbol to use in: .setDesc("The fraction symbol to use in the replacement. e.g. \\frac, \\dfrac, \\tfrac")
dict..setDesc('A list of environments to excl: .setDesc('A list of environments to exclude auto-fraction from running in. For example, to exclude auto-fraction from running while inside an exponent, such as e^{...}, use  ["^{", "}"]')
dict..setDesc('A list of characters that deno: .setDesc('A list of characters that denote the start/end of a fraction. e.g. if + is included in the list, "a+b/c" will expand to "a+\\frac{b}{c}". If + is not in the list, it will expand to "\\frac{a+b}{c}".')
dict..setDesc(\"A list of environment names t: .setDesc("A list of environment names to run the matrix shortcuts in, separated by commas.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to automatically enla: .setDesc("Whether to automatically enlarge brackets containing e.g. sum, int, frac.")
dict..setDesc(\"A list of symbols that should: .setDesc("A list of symbols that should trigger auto-enlarge brackets, separated by commas.")
dict..setDesc(\"Assign snippet variables that: .setDesc("Assign snippet variables that can be used as shortcuts when writing snippets.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to load snippet varia: .setDesc("Whether to load snippet variables from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).")
dict..setDesc('Symbols that will be treated a: .setDesc('Symbols that will be treated as word delimiters, for use with the "w" snippet option.')
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to remove trailing wh: .setDesc("Whether to remove trailing whitespaces when expanding snippets at the end of inline math blocks.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to also remove the cl: .setDesc("Whether to also remove the closing $ when you delete the opening $ symbol inside blank inline math.")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether to suppress snippets: .setDesc("Whether to suppress snippets triggering when an IME is active.")
dict..setDesc(\"Codeblock languages where the: .setDesc("Codeblock languages where the whole code block should be treated like a math block, separated by commas.")
